item.description:
Hey all it does not get any better than this!!! Get the groupon.

  • $25 (actual worth $58)
  • No belay test
  • 3 hours of instruction and climbing
  • Equipment rental and
  • FREE Two week gym membership to practice your new skills!

 

Hey ppl,

With Arvind's suggestion and permission :) I'm changing the venue to Boston Rock Gym in Woburn. There is a great groupon deal on the introductory rock climbing class at BRG. Check this link:

http://www.groupon.com/deals/boston-rock-gym-8?utm_campaign=UserReferral&utm_medium=email&utm_source=uu7120690

A lil description about the class:

Qualified, patient instructors will guide you through the basics of using the equipment (climbing shoes, a harness, locking carabiner and belay device, and chalk bag are all provided) and developing safe climbing habits. You will learn the following skills: properly tying into the rope, safely belaying in a toprope system, catching a falling climber, as well as other basics.

The class includes:

  • 3 hours of instruction and climbing
  • Equipment rental
  • A daypass for the day of the class
  • Two week gym membership to practice your new skills!

By successfully completing the beginner class, you will be able to start working on your climbing technique and endurance both on your own or, if you wish, through more advanced lessons or technique clinics.

*Cost: $58 (includes two-week membership!) Times: Sat & Sun 10am-1pm, Mon, Fri, & Sat 6-9pm

NOTE: If you purchase the groupon within 48 hours, you would save 33 bucks!
item.name: Indoor rock climbing in Boston - NO BELAY TEST REQUIRED
